comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: So the docs are learning about the Cacao tree,  the cocaine plant,  the coffee plant,  the Pernambuco Jaborandi,   and the tasmanian blue gum.    Spot the odd one out there.

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content:
there are so other odd things about that photo.  Sure a lot of those old buildings have 25 foot ceilings.   But how short are those 2 dudes ?    Shorter than the wainscoting.   And less than half of the height of the door of the room ?

All those drawings and posters pinned on the noticeboard,  nothing unusual about that,  until you compare it to the size of the 2 guys.

And then look at the floorboards.

I think those two guys are ventriloquists dummies  and the photographer is making a joke.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/mich2009] Hahaha! Perspective has a lot to answer for!
-AG
